section.name: Installation sequence
section.p: The DSA/Catalogue web-application is supplied as a web archive (.war file) to be run inside Apache Tomcat. The latter software is a "servlet container": a specialized kind of web server.
The natural sequence of installation is as follows.

ol.li: Install the DSA/Catalogue web-application in Tomcat.
Verify that DSA/Catalogue works with its built-in, dummy database.
Reconfigure DSA/Catalogue to communicate with your database of choice.
Generate the "metadoc" file describing your database (DSA/Catalogue does this for you by analyzing the database).
Add scientific metadata to your metadoc file (you do this manually).
Verify that DSA/Catalogue reads your database correctly.
Register your installation in your IVOA publishing-registry.
